modName: The Band of the Pale Crow
summary:
Traverse the River Bjoulsae and explore the Dragontail Mountains of Hammerfell… Delve deep into dungeons where unspeakable evil lies… Hunt for bounties throughout the lands…
The Band of the Pale Crow aims to add diverse content from new lands and storyline, new armors/weapons/items, to followers and other companions.
descriptionHtml:
Currently a WIP...

So far, I've only managed to finish a fraction of what I have written down and planned for this mod.
I've included custom skins/textures for everything from landscape and vegetation to actors and creatures, weapons and armor to miscellaneous items and literature.

I've also included custom music composed by myself with the aid of "Magix Music Studio" to add some personal/unique/immersive feelings to the new spaces.

I aim to make this as lore friendly as possible, but with limited information available (especially related to Hammerfell), I've had to fill in a few gaps (within reason, of course)...

-------------------------

The Key is that I've always been a lurker; downloading mods from other very talented modders... and felt that the only way I could truly repay them for enhancing my gaming experience was to try to enhance theirs. Which is why when I complete this mod, I hope for people to think of it as an expansion, rather than just a mod (to give you the idea of the size)...

Now, I am just one man (with VERY limited scripting abilities; and voice acting skills) and I must admit that I'm still learning alot about CK, but I AM highly motivated and have WAY too much time on my hands... So hopefully we'll get to see some progress very soon.

-------------------------

Credits:

I'd personally like to thank the following people/companies for providing the various tools I've used in making this mod:

Everyone at Bethesda - Of course for making the game...
The team at Magix Music Studio
The team at Adobe (for Photoshop; where would i be without you?)
Tamira - For the Modder's resource "New Plants 1_2"
Vicn - For the Modder's resource "Vicn Creature Resources"

(The following are people I'm required to credit per Tamira's request:)

Yughues aka Nobiax (http://www.sharecg.com/pf/full_uploads.php?pf_user_name=yughues) for creating almost all of the original models and textures
Birdy (http://www.sharecg.com/pf/full_uploads.php?pf_user_name=birdy) for creating the decidious tree mesh.
The Niftools team for giving us Nifskope
